quality-policy-descriptions.line-1: As a company, we aim to ensure the quality of the service we have at the end of 2012 with ISO 9001 and CE Marking certificates.
quality-policy-descriptions.line-2: Being aware of the importance of quality certification, which has become the most important requirement of today, we want to improve the functioning of our current system and improve it to international quality level. Therefore, with the beginning of 2010, we are working to speed up our certification studies and to complete this process as soon as possible and to have quality certificates by deserving them.
quality-policy-descriptions.line-3: Thus, we promise our valued customers a quality service crowned with a certificate.
